attributes.action: ensure that the sun shines over Aberdeen on August 17th, 2008, to ensure that the engage family day is a complete success!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, ask for any support the Prime Minister can give to the Engage facilitated event in Duthie Park on Aug 17th, 2008.

We know he can't make the sunshine - but we would like to think that if he could then he would! 

Come on Gordon...do a 'sun' dance for engage! http://www.your-engage.co.uk

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
